headline: AI models are 'not a recipe' for high equity returns: Strategist
summary: Artificial intelligence stocks are facing bubble concerns as investors question long-term profitability. Peter Berezin, BCA Research Chief Global Strategist and Director of Research, and Patrick Moorhead, Moor Insights & Strategy Founder, CEO & Chief Analyst, discuss risks tied to high costs and commoditized tech. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
